definitions.text: an elongated leather strip (or a strip of similar material) for binding things together or holding something in position
hanger consisting of a loop of leather suspended from the ceiling of a bus or train; passengers hold onto it
a band that goes over the shoulder and supports a garment or bag
whip consisting of a strip of leather used in flogging
beat severely with a whip or rod
examples: The teacher often flogged the students

definitions.text: secure (a sprained joint) with a strap
